data: OPHTH AMB ADULT/PED Ophthalmic Imaging Orders
Patient Care
Height/Length
once
Weight
once
Medications
Topical Anesthesic for Pediatric Patient
tetracaine 4% top liq
1 application, topical, as directed, drug form: top liq
For Dilation
PHENYLephrine 2.5% eye drop
1 drop, eye-right, 30 min pre-op, order duration: 3 doses or times, drug form: eye drop
1 drop, eye-left, 30 min pre-op, order duration: 3 doses or times, drug form: eye drop
1 drop, eye-both, 30 min pre-op, order duration: 3 doses or times, drug form: eye drop
PHENYLephrine minim 2.5% eye drop
1 drop, eye-right, q15min, order duration: 3 doses or times, drug form: eye drop
1 drop, eye-left, q15min, order duration: 3 doses or times, drug form: eye drop
1 drop, eye-both, q15min, order duration: 3 doses or times, drug form: eye drop
tropicamide 1% eye drop
1 drop, eye-right, q15min, order duration: 3 doses or times, drug form: eye drop
1 drop, eye-left, q15min, order duration: 3 doses or times, drug form: eye drop
1 drop, eye-both, q15min, order duration: 3 doses or times, drug form: eye drop
tropicamide minim 1% eye drop
1 drop, eye-right, q15min, order duration: 3 doses or times, drug form: eye drop
1 drop, eye-left, q15min, order duration: 3 doses or times, drug form: eye drop
1 drop, eye-both, q15min, order duration: 3 doses or times, drug form: eye drop
If patient is allergic to neosynephrine and/or mydriacyl, administer cyclogyl
Cyclogyl 1% ophthalmic solution
1 drop, eye-right, q15min, order duration: 3 doses or times, drug form: eye drop
1 drop, eye-left, q15min, order duration: 3 doses or times, drug form: eye drop
1 drop, eye-both, q15min, order duration: 3 doses or times, drug form: eye drop
For Gonioscopy
proparacaine 0.5% eye drop
2 drop, eye-right, q15min, order duration: 2 doses or times, drug form: eye drop
2 drop, eye-left, q15min, order duration: 2 doses or times, drug form: eye drop
2 drop, eye-both, q15min, order duration: 2 doses or times, drug form: eye drop
